subject: Public Speaking
title: Ethics in Debate
description: A fast breakdown of Ethics in Debate for builders.

hook.text: You're losing. Temptation: lie about evidence or attack them personally.

buildup.text: Debate has an honor code. Lying about evidence means expulsion.

discovery.text: Your reputation as a debater is everything in this community.

twist.text: The best debaters win through better thinking, not deception.

climax.text: Ethical debate teaches winning with integrity. It transfers to life.

punchline.text: Debate ethically. It's the only way.
